text: Dogovorivshis' izbavit'sya ot Yusufa, oni skazali: "O otets! Pochemu ty nam ne doveryayesh' Yusufa i bespokoish'sya, kogda on s nami? Zaveryayem tebya, chto my vse deystvitel'no yego lyubim i zhaleyem, i zhelayem yemu blaga, i vedom yego k dobru. On nikogda ne videl ot nas nichego, krome lyubvi i poleznogo soveta
